title: Mason Ho
description:
New video of Arnette Surf Team member, Mason Ho, tearing it up in the water and messing around with the bones. From ankle slappers to giant monsters, Mason has fun surfing it all.

A native Hawaiian and North Shore local, Mason is also the son of the legendary Michael Ho.

Mason's rocking the new Dibs in this edit, which features interchangeable arms so you can mix your look up on the fly (a second set comes with purchase).
